import { ConstructionOutlined } from '@mui/icons-material' import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import FriendList from './FriendList' import Navbar from './Navbar' import LeaderboardUser from './LeaderboardUser' function Leaderboard() { const userCommunityId = useSelector(state => state.auth.user.community) const [userArray, setUserArray] = useState([]) // also want to update whenever socket changes, as well as friends sidebar useEffect(() => { fetch(`/api/workouts/program/${userCommunityId}/members`) .then(res => res.json()) .then(data => setUserArray(data)) }, []) const tableElements = userArray.sort((a, b) => a.streak - b.streak).map((user, index) => { const { username, community, profilePic, streak } = user return }) return (
{tableElements}
Rank Streak Member Name Community Name
) } export default Leaderboard
